s.text: And waiting in the wings are the plague squirrels and killer bees."

Segregation on Chicago's South Side is as vicious as it is in Compton, and if you're talking about criminalizing the poor and turning public space over to Disney, then Rudolph Giuliani's New York City would seem to be the current industry leader.
